item.title: Passive Investing
item.description: I’ve been boning up on investing for some time now, essentially trying to understand the various options available to the average Joe. I don’t claim to be anything other than an interested amateur, and thought I’d share some of the resources I’ve I’ve come across. Resources Not all of these are specifically aimed at passive investing, nor aimed at the UK market. Blogs Monevator - Fantastic UK resource for the average person interested in (passive) investing.
